document_data.name: Dome Dancers
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Dome Dancers''' were a religious organization in [[Zakhara]] whose members followed the teachings of [[Haku]], the Zakharan god of freedom.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|29}}

The Dome Dancers wielded [[scimitar]]s in both hands.
document_data.Activities:
Similar to the [[Dancing Dwarves]], the Dome Dancers were [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystics]] known as ''dervishes''. They derived their power from vigorous dancing and twirling.

Their main goal was to completely free the desert tribes from any influence of the great cities of Zakhara. They would regularly join various desert tribes in raids on the civilized folk.
document_data.Members: As of [[1367 DR]], there were 500 Dome Dancers in Zakhara.
document_data.Base of Operations: The [[Desert Mosque]] within the northern regions of the [[High Desert]] was their center of power.
